name: Bone Shaker - Boneyard - Mace
additionalNotes: A great follow-up to the original Boneshaker blend, Boneshaker Boneyard Cigars is another strong blend from the famed NACSA factory in Nicaragua that’s also not for the faint of heart.This high-octane Nicaraguan puro blend, made from the finest Cuban seed tobaccos, is brimming with complex full-bodied flavors of white pepper, espresso, wood, some earthiness, and hints of cinnamon.
